transitions.name: ADMITTED
transitions.description: The new process was admitted by the OS

READY.name: READY
READY.description: Process is ready to be assigned

transitions.name: RUN
transitions.description: The process resources assignment is done.

RUNNING.name: RUNNING
RUNNING.description: The process is running and its resources have been assigned

transitions.name: EXIT
transitions.description: The process has either exited as completed or an error has ocurred

transitions.name: BLOCK
transitions.description: The process is waiting for an external operation to finish

transitions.name: INTERRUPTED
transitions.description: The process execution has been interrupted

WAITING.name: WAITING
WAITING.description: Process is waiting for an external event to finish

transitions.name: RESUMED
transitions.description: The process waiting for an external action has finished
